OOC:( It's a strange ship.  How would she know it didn't have 
autoguns?)

::KitKat::

She called from where she stood.
"I am KitKat. I was sent from the Pred base to talk to you at your 
request."

She still kept her gun ready.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> (FYI my ship doesn't have autoguns.)
> 
> Phobia slipped out the top hatch to avoid being seen, His spider 
mode 
> pulled the large decimator rifles behind him. "Computer scan area"
> 
> The computers voice replied back almost instantly, "Scan complete, 
1 
> cybertronian lifeform detected."
> 
> "Then I won't be needing this," he lowered one rifle back inside 
the 
> ship.
> 
> He looked over the side towards where the scans showed Kit Kat 
(Gimme 
> a break, sorry couldn't resist) He transformed to robot and held 
his 
> rifle at shoulders height."State your name and function stranger." 
He 
> knew where she was, she probably knew where he was. It was only his 
> advantage if she knew about the weapon he held.
